tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_tokens (
    token_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    token_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issuer VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    total_supply DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE token_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    token_id INT REFERENCES digital_asset_tokens(token_id),
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(18,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE asset_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id INT REFERENCES digital_assets(asset_id),
  sender_id INT REFERENCES asset_owners(owner_id),
  receiver_id INT REFERENCES asset_owners(owner_id),
  amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tokens (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    token_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    total_supply BIGINT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_id INT NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    amount BIGINT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blocks (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    previous_block_hash VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    nonce INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE token_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_id INT,
    from_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    to_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount BIGINT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
